price: 37. L’homme a été créé empressé. Je vous ferai voir Mes Signes, ne Me pressez pas !
arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: khuliqa al-insānu min ʿajalin sa-urīkum āyātī falā tastaʿjilūni
